title: Boeing Plans to Move Headquarters to Washington, D.C., Area From Chicago; Aerospace giant's move would bring senior executives closer to decision makers in the U.S. government
text:
* Boeing Announces Plans to Move Its Headquarters Out of Seattle (March 21, 2001)

An announcement of the move, details of which haven't been finalized, is expected as soon as next week, according to some of these people.

(More to Come)

Boeing Plans to Move Headquarters to Washington, D.C., Area From Chicago
